cards.title: Weaver
cards.powers: {Weaver} deals 1 target 1 Projectile damage. That target deals 1 less damage until the start of Weaver's next turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now
Reduce the damage dealt to Hero character by 1 until the start of your next turn

openingLines.default: The Threads all end here! You [i]must[/i] be stopped!

cards.title: Inertia Patch
body: Play next to a Hero Character.
At the start of the Equipped Hero's turn, they may destroy this patch to increase their damage by 1 until the start of their next turn.

cards.title: Kevlar Patch
body: Play next to a Hero Character.
At the start of the Equipped Hero's turn, they may destroy this patch to reduce damage dealt to this hero by 1 until the start of their next turn.

cards.title: Gaia Patch
body: Play next to a Hero Character.
At the start of the Equipped Hero's Turn, they may destroy this patch to regain 3 HP

cards.title: Haste Patch
body: Play next to a Hero Character.
At the start of the Equipped Hero's turn, they may destroy this patch to play an additional card this turn.
cards.flavorText: Woven from the Rush of Velocity

cards.title: Adrenal Patch
body: Play next to a Hero Character.
At the start of the Equipped Hero's turn, they may destroy this patch to use an additional power this turn.
cards.flavorText: Woven from an Essence of Mana

cards.title: Psych Patch
body: Play next to a Hero Character.
At the start of the Equipped Hero's turn, they may destroy this patch to draw an additional card during their draw phase this turn.
cards.flavorText: Woven from Thoughts of the Future

cards.title: Phase Patch
body: Play next to a Hero Character.
At the start of the Equipped Hero's turn, they may destroy this patch to make their damage irreducible until the start of their next turn.

cards.title: Spool the Thread
body: Draw 4 cards.
Discard 2 cards

flavorQuotes.text: I need my finest thread, Sixty-Three!

cards.title: Raid the Stockpiles
body: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Patches. Put them in your hand, shuffle the rest back into your deck
You may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I know it was in here somewhere!

cards.title: Quick Patchwork
body: At the start of your turn, you may play a Patch.
powers: Draw a card. You may play a patch.

flavorQuotes.text: This should be a quick patch

cards.title: Quick Weaving
body: You may play up to 3 Patches now.

flavorQuotes.text: I made them ahead of time.

cards.title: Read the Weave
body: At the start of each turn, Weaver may deal herself 1 Psychic damage. If she does, look at the top 2 cards of any deck and put them back in any order.
If Book of Fate is in play, look at the top 4
At the start if your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: By reading the Seams of the Universe{BR}I can influence the future.

cards.title: Inspiration Strikes
powers: You may deal up to 3 targets 1 Projectile damage. For each target dealt damage this way, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I just had a wonderous idea

cards.title: Resource Reclamation
body: When one of your patches is destroyed, you may draw a card.

cards.title: Book of Fate
body: The first time you play a Weave each turn, you may use a power.
powers: Look at the top 3 cards of any deck and put them back in any order.

flavorQuotes.text: More than samples, dear,{BR}It's the story of [i]us[/i].

cards.title: Loom Of Fate
body: At the start of your turn, you may put a Patch from your trash into your hand.
powers: You may play a Patch now.

flavorQuotes.text: That Loom can rewrite fate itself!

cards.title: Divine Needles
body: Increase Projectile Damage dealt by Weaver by 1.
powers: You may deal up to 3 targets 1 Irreducible Projectile damage. Targets dealt damage this way deal 1 less damage until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Careful, they can rip the universe

cards.title: Anansi
body: At the start of your turn, {Anansi} deals himself 2 Psychic damage.
When Patches are destroyed, they go to your hand instead of your trash.
powers: You may search your deck for a Patch and put it into play, then Anansi deals himself 2 Psychic damage.
